title: Cylum's Sega Master System/Game Gear/SG-1000 ROM Sets (2014)
description:
This torrent contains the following folders:

- Sega Game Gear

- Sega Master System

- SG-1000


'Sega Game Gear' & 'Sega Master System' have the the following sub-folders:

- [BIOS]: BIOS files for each system.

- [Europe]: Games that only have a European release.

- [Japan]: Games that only have a Japanese release.

- [USA]: Complete USA Set.


'SG-1000' contains the following sub-folders:

- [BIOS]: BIOS file.

- [Europe]: Complete EU/AU/NZ ROM Set.

- [Japan]: Games that only have a Japanese release.

- [Othello Multivision]: Games released only for the Othello Multivision clone system.


Additional files:

- Fusion364: Emulator.


All of the titles were renamed to their official title name that's on the box art. Removed all of the GoodTools/NoIntro, etc. tags (can be easily restored using a rom mananger and specific data files). All ROMs have been tested to make sure they're working/clean dumps. All the games are archived in their own individual zip folders.
